tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"画地为牢","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"以自己为圆心半径 1.4~3.8 格连续环形召唤 5 层尖刺，","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"且在 1 秒内避免摔伤，","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"受击者获得 5 秒挖掘疲劳I & 缓慢I。","color":"gray","italic":false}','""','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"1 次","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"3 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"6 点/次     ","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"20 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
